      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String getOsName()
      Gets a value indicating the operating system name.
      static boolean isUnix()
      Gets a value indicating if the operating system name is Unix-like (Solaris, SunOS, Linux, Mac, BSD).
      static boolean isWindows()
      Gets a value indicating if the operating system name indicates Windows.
